SELECT NVL(MAX(recomdate_no) + 1, 1) recomdate_no, NVL(MAX(recomdate_start) + 7, '2020/06/30') recomdate_start, NVL(MAX(recomdate_end) + 7, '2020/07/06') recomdate_end FROM recomdatetab
